title: Development of Information Technology Establishments / Data Center shall be regulated as per the Information Technology & Information Technology Enabled Services (IT / ITES) Policy - 2023 as declared by Industries Department vide Government Resolution No
clause_text: Development of Information Technology Establishments / Data Center shall be regulated as per the Information Technology & Information Technology Enabled Services (IT / ITES) Policy - 2023 as declared by Industries Department vide Government Resolution No.ITP-2021/CR-170/ IND-2, dated 27/06/2023 and amended from time to time which are mentioned below :-
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Development of Information Technology Establishments / Data Center shall be regulated as per the Information Technology & Information Technology Enabled Services (IT / ITES) Policy - 2023 as declared
